title: $:/plugins/yaisog/choose-random-filter
author: yaisog
name: choose-random
description: select random tiddler(s) from the input
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://yaisog.tiddlyhost.com/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://yaisog.tiddlyhost.com/"/> \define set-size() 49 \define number-of-draws() 6 |!purpose |select one or more random tiddlers from the input | |!input |a selection of titles | |!suffix |`A` = optional `all` flag | |!parameter |`N` = an integer, defaulting to 1 | |!output |one or more randomly selected tiddlers | The `choose-random` filter operator is used to select random tiddler(s) from the input. The parameter `N` determines the number of returned tiddlers. When the suffix `all` is used, all input tiddlers are returned. Tiddlers are returned in random order, so that the filter can also be used to shuffle lists (with the `all` suffix). ''Important Notice''
The output of `choose-random` will change with each page refresh (see examples below). In order to e.g. display a random tiddler that does not change with every keystroke or mouse click, use an action widget to save a random tiddler title to a (temporary) tiddler and use that tiddler's value. The action widget could be triggered by e.g. a startup action, a button click or even a timer (requires additional plugin).
Refer to the last examples below. !! Examples !!! Random image Random image from the core:
<$transclude tiddler={{{ [all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[]] }}} /> ``` [all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[]] ``` !!! Random sub-list Three random image tiddlers:
<$list filter="[all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[3]]"> ''<$text text=<> />''
``` [all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]choose-random[3]] ``` !!! Shuffle list Shuffle the numbers from 1 to 10: ''<$text text={{{ [range[10]choose-random:all[]join[ ]] }}} />'' ``` [range[10]choose-random:all[]join[ ]] ``` !!! Persistent random title Only updated when a corresponding action is triggered <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/persistent-choose-random" $value={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]choose-random[]] }}} />"""> Click here <$link to={{$:/temp/persistent-choose-random}}/> ``` <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/persistent-choose-random" $value={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]choose-random[]] }}} />"""> Click here <$link to={{$:/temp/persistent-choose-random}}/> ``` !!! Lotto 6 drawings from the set [1,49] without replacement: <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/choose-random-lotto" $value={{{ [rangechoose-randomnsort[]join[ ]] }}} />"""> Play Lotto! ''<$text text={{$:/temp/choose-random-lotto}} />'' ``` \define set-size() 49 \define number-of-draws() 6 <$button actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/choose-random-lotto" $value={{{ [rangechoose-randomnsort[]join[ ]] }}} />"""> Play Lotto! ''<$text text={{$:/temp/choose-random-lotto}} />'' ``` This is considerably simpler ~WikiText than trying to do this with a [[simple random number generator|$:/plugins/yaisog/modules/filters/random.js]]. --- Hat tip to Jeremy Ruston for the persistent storage idea.
